segments.text: Hello , ABC Company . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . I am calling to apply for a job as an accountant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you name some courses you completed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . The main courses I took included commercial accounting , cost accounting , industrial accounting , electronic accounting , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2
